_description: A Christmas carol — seven quatrains (aaab) including refrain, ‘Puer natus est nobis’, plus burden: ‘Now syng we wyth joy and blys / Puer natus est nobis’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Mary flowr of flowers allHath born a chyld in an ox
                    stall…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…Shryft & hosyll at owr endyngPuer natus est
                    nobisExplicit
OxfBal354.Facsimiles:
Early Manuscripts at Oxford University: Facsimile

         (http://image.ox.ac.uk/show?collection=balliol&manuscript=ms354).
